articles.title: A new foldable smartphone is becoming as popular as an Apple iPhone model in China - CNBC
articles.description: On Chinese e-commerce site JD.com's "hot sales" smartphone rankings this week, the Honor Magic V2 foldable vies with Apple iPhone models for the top three.
articles.content:
BEIJING On Chinese e-commerce site JD.com's "hot sales" smartphone rankings this week, the Honor Magic V2 foldable vies with Apple iPhone models for the top three spots.
Honor, spun off from Huawei,… [+3525 chars]
